title: Hailey And Justin Bieber's Wedding Has Already Angered Hotel Guests
text:
From ELLE

Approximately 12 months after legally tying the knot at a Manhattan courthouse, Hailey Bieber (née Baldwin) and Justin finally ready ready for their lavish wedding ceremony.

The couple exchanged vows in front of a registrar in September 2018, after a whirlwind three month engagement, with the model taking on her husband's surname shortly afterwards.

And now, a year later, the Biebers are finally ready to stand in front of all of their family and friends (and the rest of the world) and say 'I Do.'

Photo credit: Ricky Vigil M - Getty Images More

Where Are Hailey And Justin Bieber Getting Married?

The pair have all-but booked out the Montage Palmetto Bluff hotel, which is in South Carolina, in the USA.

Among the hotel's many qualities, we're sure that the pair were drawn to the fact that it has an on-site chapel - the Sommerset Chapel.

Photo credit: Montage Hotels - Palmetto Bluff More

It also sports a ball room and a particularly grand wine cellar, which are also compelling selling points!

Photo credit: Montage hotels More

The hotel being situated on the river also provides for plenty of excellent views and the opportunity for outdoor cooking.

When are Hailey and Justin Bieber getting married?

Although the pair have reportedly been legally wed since September 2018, after their courthouse wedding date, the grand ceremony, which they are staging for their family and friends, takes place this coming Monday - September 30, 2019.

Story continues
description: The South Carolina ceremony is about to happen!
